title.en: The Pulsing Heart of the Emerald Abyss

description.ko: 이끼 같은 생물학적 구조를 통해 흐르는 빛의 리드미컬한 박동에 초점을 맞춘, 수중 유기 생명체에 대한 매우 상세한 탐구입니다.
description.en: A highly detailed exploration of organic life underwater, focusing on the rhythmic pulse of light through moss-like biological structures.

prompt: A microscopic, cinematic view of a breathing heart-chamber formed from translucent #7FB069 emerald moss and #2D5A3D vascular vines, pulsing with rhythmic #FFE66D liquid sap. The organ is suspended in a deep #2D5A3D underwater trench, surrounded by drifting #E6F2E1 bioluminescent spores and wispy glowing tendrils. Intense subsurface scattering on the mossy membranes creates a soft, living glow. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Cinematic volumetric light shafts pierce through the dark green water, highlighting the fluid flow of organic energy and the microscopic texture of the breathing light of nature.
